reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks like the picture and appreciate its fit, with one noting it hits just below the mid-thigh.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Mix of Classy and Fun!
items.body: I bought this black dress for an 80s-themed party, and it ended up being the highlight of my outfit! The fit is super flattering ‚Äì it hugs in the right places without being too tight, and the flowy sleeves add just the right amount of drama. The length is perfect (short enough to be fun, but still classy), and I love how versatile it is. The fabric feels great against the skin and has just enough stretch to be comfortable all night long. I danced, posed for pictures, and even chased balloons ‚Äì and it never felt restrictive. I paired it with white socks and platform Mary Janes for a retro vibe, but honestly, this dress could be styled up or down for so many occasions. If you‚Äôre looking for a little black dress that works for both themed events and nights out, this one is a winner. I got so many compliments ‚Äì highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Kayla Biathrow

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Costume-like fabric. Amazon told me to use XXL, I was perfectly fine with XL.
items.body: Amazon told me to get a xxl, I didn‚Äôt trust that so I went for an xl instead- I like a little extra fabric, otherwise I usually wear large. Tried it on and it fits great! The fabric is a kinda strange texture- but that‚Äôs fine cause I‚Äôm using it for a costume anyway. If you‚Äôre well endowed in your breast region I‚Äôd def recommend purchasing a sturdy bra for this cause it has 0 support due to no straps üòÇ but very cute otherwise! Oh! And the neckline as well as the waist is kinda stretchy! So don‚Äôt worry if you‚Äôre an in between of XXL and XL! Get that XL, girl! Read more
items.author: Natalie Henry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress for my daughter
items.body: Very pretty!! Bought for my daughter to wear to homecoming! She's in 9th grade, about 5'1, 110 lbs and we ordered an XS. It fit perfectly! Not too short, or tight, not see through (in Navy Blue at least). Fabric is decent, it's a basic polyester. Quality is decent for the price. Not too fancy, very classic looking, just what we wanted! Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Be wary if you have a larger chest! Otherwise very cute :)
items.body: The media could not be loaded. For context, I am a 38 DD, 190-195 lbs. I had purchased this dress for my Halloween costume and I bought an XL. Unfortunately the XXL and 3XLs ran out by the time I was looking for a dress, so I resorted to the XL. The XL had a C-D cup padding and was not suitable for my chest, making my chest sag. So I decided to stick with the XL and purchase a strapless bra (strapless bra REALLY helped!!), so that was the final product. Be wary and conscious of your body type when you purchase online; I would say that the turn out looked great and the dress really captured my curves and had an overall feminine look! Otherwise, soft and comfortable dress! Read more
items.author: Sereen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dirty stains on the bodice
items.body: The dress fitting was great. It arrived early. It looked good on me. I am 5‚Äô2‚Äù and 124 lbs and order my regular size (small). The dress had dusty spots, like either it had been sitting in a dirty warehouse for many years or something fell down and stained it and no one bothered to clean. Material was sturdy, but on rougher side. Read more
items.author: Sasha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dress
items.body: Dress was good quality and stretchy. Color appeared as a true white and was not very see through. I am 5‚Äô3 and the length came right above my knees. However the style/shape did not work on my body type Read more
items.author: BC

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but sent TWO used ones!!!! Wtf!
items.body: While this dress is super cute, I ordered it and they sent me the wrong size (with a broken zipper), I ordered a replacement and they sent one with no tags and deodorant stains‚Ä¶.. gross. I need it for some photos so I‚Äôm just praying I can wash it out. Read more
items.author: Libby C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: I have three of these so far, love the, and need one in every color. Super simple so you can style these in so many ways Read more
items.author: CC

short_description:
Womens Dress Off Shoulder Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Off Shoulder Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Apricot, Purple Red, Army Green, Black, Camel, Orange, Mint Green, Red, Rose Red, Pink, White, Cream White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
